mapper.sql: with coupon_info as( select cpb.prm_no , cpb.prm_nm , cpb.prm_priod_ccd , cpb.prm_strt_dt , cpb.prm_end_dt , cpb.prm_std_dd , to_date(ccb.dwl_avl_strt_dd, 'YYYYMMDD') as dwl_avl_strt_dd , to_date(ccb.dwl_avl_end_dd, 'YYYYMMDD') as dwl_avl_end_dd , ccb.dwl_psb_cnt , ccb.psn_dwl_psb_cnt from cc_prm_base cpb inner join cc_cpn_base ccb on cpb.prm_no = ccb.prm_no where cpb.use_yn = 'Y' and now() between ccb.dwl_avl_strt_dd::date and ccb.dwl_avl_end_dd::date + 1 )
mapper.select: select ci.* , (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo}) as dwl_cpt_cnt , (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo} and mbr_no = #{mbrNo}) as psn_dwl_cpt_cnt from coupon_info ci where prm_no = #{prmNo}

select case when ci.prm_priod_ccd = "20" then cci.sys_mod_dtime + ci.prm_std_dd * interval '1 day' else ci.prm_end_dt end as prm_end_dt from coupon_info ci inner join cc_cpn_issue cci on ci.prm_no = cci.prm_no where cci.cpn_iss_no = #{cpnIssNo}
